oathauth-user-not-does-not-have-oath-ena: Geavaheaddji ii leat váldán guovtteceahkat autentiserema atnui, nappo ii leat vejolaš váldit dan eret anus.
oathauth-auth-token-help: Háválas beassansátni, mii geavahuvvo guovtteceahkat autentiserema nuppi ceahkis:
logentry-oath-disable-other: Geavaheaddji $1 {{GENDER:$2|váldet}} siiddu $3 guovtteceahkat autentiserema eret anus
logentry-oath-verify: Geavaheaddji $1 {{GENDER:$2|dárkkistii}}, leigo siiddus $3 guovtteceahkat autentiseren váldojuvvon atnui
notification-header-oathauth-disable: {{GENDER:$2|Du geavaheaddjidovddaldagas}} guovtteceahkat autentiseren lea váldojuvvon eret anus.
notification-header-oathauth-enable: {{GENDER:$2|Du geavaheaddjidovddaldagas}} guovtteceahkat autentiseren lea váldojuvvon atnui.
oathauth-verify-enabled: Geavaheaddji {{GENDER:$1|$1}} lea váldán guovtteceahkat autentiserema atnui.
oathauth-verify-disabled: Geavaheaddji {{GENDER:$1|$1}} ii leat váldán guovtteceahkat autentiserema atnui.
